meanings.definition: Expenses - the cost required for something
meanings.sent1: I need to keep track of my spenses to stay within my budget.
meanings.sent2: She carefully calculated all her spenses for the month.
meanings.sent3: My spenses seem to disappear as soon as I get paid!
meanings.sent4: Her spenses weighed heavily on her mind as she tried to save money.
meanings.sent5: Tracking your spenses can help you manage your finances better.

meanings.definition: Dispenses - distribute or provide (a service or information)
meanings.sent1: The vending machine dispenses snacks when you insert coins.
meanings.sent2: He dispenses advice to anyone who asks for help.
meanings.sent3: The robot dispenses candy to children at the store.
meanings.sent4: She dispenses medicine to patients at the clinic.
meanings.sent5: The teacher dispenses knowledge to eager students in the classroom.
